content:
So I created this DropBox paper to define the meeting agenda etc. But maybe we should talk it over.

I'm not sure if discussing the details of 2PB etc is the best thing to talk about -- maybe it is.

But I'm interested to hear if others have thoughts.

Some ideas of mine:

  • Discussing how to go about drafting a spec
  • Discussing any further migration questions
  • A more general retrospective (as I mentioned)

We've only got 1 hr, though, so I don't think we should do anything too general -- though it's true we can take over lunch.
